column9: This is an impressive building! I would have loved to have gone inside. I loved how the ivy covered the building. Located right by the cathedral, its worth wondering around the old university buildings.

If you are in the center of Lund it will be really hard for you to miss it. Easy to take some nice photos. There is some history to the building if one might be interested in that. If you are in Lund sort of...More

This is Lund Universities oldest building. It is currently closed since the philosophical department moved to Lux. It will be renovated and open sometime in the future. Lund University is celebrating its 350 year anniversary from December 2016-January2018 and nothing will be done before this....More

Hit gick man till Filosoficirkeln! Mäktig byggnad med mytologi.

Fantastisk trappa. Stora salar. Klassiskt!
